alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 3:44PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong cold front will impact portions of eastern Cheyenne and southeastern Kit Carson Counties in east central Colorado, Wallace County in west central Kansas, south central Cheyenne and southern Thomas Counties in northwestern Kansas, western Logan County in west central Kansas and Sherman Counties in northwestern Kansas through 430 PM MDT/530 PM CDT/... At 343 PM MDT/443 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong cold front along a line extending from 12 miles north of Goodland to 3 miles east of Ruleton to 15 miles south of Burlington. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brewster and Weskan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 3 and 67. Highway 385 between mile markers 141 and 184. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
